urls.title: Coronavirus Disease 2019
urls.description: County of San Diego public health information on COVID-19. Case data, testing sites, health order, guidance on reopening and gatherings.

text: The state has approved San Diego County to move farther through Stage 2 reopening, allowing dine-in restaurants and in-store retail businesses, with modifications. Steps for businesses to follow on https://t.co/2znbjgcyZ5
